H0.text: Nitrogen, arsenic, and antimony have chemical properties similar to those of phosphorus.

H1.text: Carbon, selenium, and iodine are the elements that have chemical properties similar to those of phosphorus.

H2.text: Silicon, sulfur, and germanium have chemical properties similar to those of phosphorus.

H3.text: Silicon, sulfur, and chlorine have chemical properties similar to those of phosphorus.
